summary: The Dassault Rafale is a French fighter jet used for various military missions, like air combat and ground attacks. It's known for its advanced technology, including a special radar and infrared sensors. Originally planned in the 1970s, it faced delays but first flew in 1986. Unlike other European fighters, most of it was built in France. There are three main types: Rafale C (land-based, single-seat), Rafale B (land-based, twin-seat), and Rafale M (carrier-based, single-seat). Introduced in 2001, it's used by the French military and has been sold to several other countries. It's considered one of the world's most advanced and capable warplanes.
title: Dassault Rafale
